entry.title: Russia Steps Up Artillery Attacks in Ukraine's East
entry.content: Moscow ramped up its efforts to capture more territory in Ukraineâ€™s east, while Kyiv sought to win international support for its peace terms.

entry.title: Heaviest Fighting in Years Breaks Out in Congo Over Control of Minerals
entry.content: Long-simmering ethnic tensions in the eastern Democratic Republic of Congo have erupted into the most intense clashes in a decade as warring militias fight for control of the region and its mineral riches.
